comments:
This is related to bug 107013. I thought the problem was solved and gave it a   
try: GTK+ 2.6.10, Eclipse 3.1.1 M20050914-1235.   
It's not useable at all; not a even on a fresh workspace. I'm attaching the log   
where you can see exceptions thrown when trying to switch the desktop (the 
error java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 306 is for the second  
launch, when Eclipse is not starting at all).

Created an attachment (id=27204)
The workspace log

M20050907-1200 together with GTK+ 2.6.7 gives the same result:
